00054 CollisionCheckingRos::CollisionCheckingRos(costmap_2d::Costmap2DROS* costmap) : costmap(costmap) {
00055 }

00058

00065 bool CollisionCheckingRos::check(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& path, const FrameWithId& actualPose) {
00066     bool result = collisionCheck(path, actualPose, 0.1, 100);
00067     return result;
00068 }
00069 
00070 bool CollisionCheckingRos::collisionCheck(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& path,
00071         const FrameWithId& actualPose, double interpolationStep, unsigned int numberOfSteps) {
00072 
00073     bool collision = false;
00074 
00075     if (path.empty())
00076         return collision;
00077     
00078     costmap_2d::Costmap2D costmapCopy;
00079     std::vector <geometry_msgs::Point> orientedFootprint;
00080 
00081     costmap->getOrientedFootprint(orientedFootprint);
00082 //    double circumscribedRadius = costmap->getCircumscribedRadius();
00083 //    double inscribedRadius = costmap->getInscribedRadius();
00084 
00085     costmap->clearRobotFootprint();
00086     costmap->getCostmapCopy(costmapCopy);
00087     base_local_planner::CostmapModel collisionChecker(costmapCopy);
00088 
00089     std::vector <FrameWithId> prunedPath;
00090     prunePath(path, actualPose, prunedPath);
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094     LinearInterpolation interpolator;
00095     std::vector <FrameWithId> interpolatedPath;
00096     interpolator.interpolate(prunedPath, interpolatedPath, interpolationStep, numberOfSteps);
00097 
00098 #ifdef DEBUG
00099     Stopwatch stopwatch;
00100     stopwatch.start();
00101 #endif
00102 
00103     size_t i;
00104     for (i = 0; i < interpolatedPath.size(); ++i) {
00105         const FrameWithId& frame = interpolatedPath[i];
00106         double r, p, y;
00107         frame.M.GetRPY(r, p, y);
00108         //    ROS_INFO("Frame: %f, %f, %f", frame.p.x(), frame.p.y(), y);
00109 
00110         geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
00111         conversions::frameToPoseStampedRos(frame, pose);
00112 
00113         std::vector <geometry_msgs::Point> orientedFootprint;
00114         costmap->getOrientedFootprint(frame.p.x(), frame.p.y(), 0, orientedFootprint);
00115         double circumscribedRadius = costmap->getCircumscribedRadius();
00116         double inscribedRadius = costmap->getInscribedRadius();
00117 
00118         double c = collisionChecker.footprintCost(pose.pose.position,
00119                 orientedFootprint,
00120                 inscribedRadius,
00121                 circumscribedRadius);
00122 
00123         if (c < 0) {
00124             ROS_INFO("Collision at pose: %f, %f", pose.pose.position.x, pose.pose.position.y);
00125             collision = true;
00126             break;
00127         }
00128 
00129     }
00130 
00131 #ifdef DEBUG  
00132     stopwatch.stop();
00133     LOG("Collision checking using costmap2d_ros:");
00134     LOG("  - collision: %d", collision);
00135     LOG("  - step size: %f", interpolationStep);
00136     LOG("  - iterations : %lu", i);
00137     LOG("  - duration : %f ms", stopwatch.getElapsedTime());
00138 #endif
00139 
00140     return collision;
00141 }
